channel.title: CVE Feed for Rockwell Automation -- CompactLogix 5370
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rockwell Automation -- CompactLogix 5370

item.title: CVE-2022-3157|2024-08-03T01:00:10.589Z -- rockwell%20automation -- compactlogix%205370
item.description: A vulnerability exists in the Rockwell Automation controllers that allows a malformed CIP request to cause a major non-recoverable fault (MNRF) and a denial-of-service condition (DOS).
